backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, content packages, video assets, and leads with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authenticated layout, route definitions, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Conten: Component showing lead counts, status breakdowns, and recent submissions for a content package.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with query cache clearing and login state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog allowing users to enter and save their name via a profile creation mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation links and user profile display, using router navigation and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper providing header, main content container, and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoAsset: Interface to add video assets via upload or URL and display existing video items with metadata.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoUploa: Form to upload a video file, handle progress, and save a video asset with optional metadata.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoUrlFo: Form to create a video asset from an external URL with optional metadata fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider offering identity loading, login, logout, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, content packages, video assets, and leads through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and sets light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/blobStorage.ts: Implements a simple local blob URL creator simulating video upload with optional progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/templates/contentTempla: Generates captions, hashtags, shot lists, and checklists for content packages based on selected vehicle and campaign parameters.
frontend/src/lib/urlTracking.ts: Parses UTM parameters from the URL and builds tracking-enabled URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ContentDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a content package with caption, hashtags, shots, checklists, and related leads.
Provides a UI to generate and save new content packages using customizable parameters.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing content package stats, top-performing content, and lead counts using fetched package and lead data.
Confirmation page displaying a success message after a lead submission.
frontend/src/pages/LeadDetailPage.tsx: Detailed view for a single lead with status updates, notes, and contact info management.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsListPage.tsx: Lists all leads with search and status filtering, allowing navigation to individual lead details.
frontend/src/pages/PublicLandingPage.tsx: Public form for submitting new leads tied to a content package, validating inputs and creating the lead.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended color tokens, typography/container/animation plugins, and custom animations, fonts, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, image requirements, and state versioning for a social‑media and lead‑generation app for a Ford dealership.
